definition: a swaggering show of courage, to act in an arrogant, overly self-assured, or conceited manner
details:
noun
- a swaggering show of courage
= synonyms: bravado
- vain and empty boasting
= synonyms: braggadocio, rodomontade, rhodomontade
- a violent gusty wind
- noisy confusion and turbulence
= example: noisy confusion and turbulence
verb
- to act in an arrogant, overly self-assured, or conceited manner
= example: to act in an arrogant, overly self-assured, or conceited manner
= synonyms: swagger
- to show off
= example: to show off
= synonyms: brag
- to blow hard
= example: to blow hard
= synonyms: storm
